attributes.action: Prevent Donald Trump from making a State Visit to the United Kingdom
attributes.additional_details: Any world leader who describes migrants as animals, brags about sexual assault, denies climate change etc etc etc should not be welcomed by our parliament, our government nor our Head of State
attributes.background: Donald Trump should not be invited to make an official State Visit because it would cause embarrassment to Her Majesty the Queen. Instead the money should be spent on disabled people; children; elderly people; social care; housing; the NHS...
